FuncDef: This command specifies the jitter buffer size, in milliseconds, and payload size, in bytes.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the jitter buffer size in milliseconds (ms). Values-1 - 250.

Specifies the payload size (in bytes) of packets transmitted to the packet service network (PSN) by the CEM SAP. This determines the size of the data that will be transmitted over the service. If the size of the data received is not consistent with the payload size then the packet is considered malformed. Values-16 to 2048. ParamDefault: Default- The default value depends on the CEM SAP endpoint type, and if applicable, the number of timeslots:
